description:
8.5 acrossfade
Apply cross fade from one input audio stream to another input audio stream.
The cross fade is applied for specified duration near the end of first stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: acrossfade

options.description: Specify the number of samples for which the cross fade effect has to last. At the end of the cross fade effect the first input audio will be completely silent. Default is 44100.
options.name: nb_samples

options.description: Specify the duration of the cross fade effect. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax. By default the duration is determined by nb_samples. If set this option is used instead of nb_samples.
options.name: duration

options.description: Should first stream end overlap with second stream start. Default is enabled.
options.name: overlap

options.description: Set curve for cross fade transition for first stream.
options.name: curve1

options.description:
Set curve for cross fade transition for second stream.

For description of available curve types see afade filter description.
options.name: curve2
